ygData.subject: Re: Platemail vs Banded vs Leather
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Nah, but an old college professor of mine said he lived in those times, and even translated texts and edited the major literary anthologies for the
ygData.messageBody:
>From: "Fun Bob" <fun-bob@...>
>
>Wow man. Do you teach High School History in California!? You sound like my
>old teacher! (He was a cool guy, so dont take it the wrong way)
>


Nah, but an old college professor of mine said he "lived" in those times,
and even translated texts and edited the major literary anthologies for the
period. Still think I have all my notes somewhere, the guy knew
everything. Even tried teaching us Old English a little, was amazing.

Just remember all his lectures on pre-medieval/medieval weaponry, was like
he was discussing a computer game, heheh.

Roop
